item.title: Nahe add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Remember who you are and what God expects you to become." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Choose your love. Love your choice." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I willna let ye go" -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Write the kind of story you would like to read. People will give you all sorts of advice about writing, but if you are not writing something you like, no one else will like it either." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Someday you're really going to have to describe to me in more detail what life is like on the planet you live on. Because it sounds really great, and I'd like to visit there one day." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description:
"I just want to let you know that when I look into my future, I see nothing but you.” That’s what Chaz had whispered in my ear at some point during the wedding last night.
Then he’d whispered. “And you’re not even wearing Spanx." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Melissa Marr
item.description: "Sometimes love means letting go when you want to hold on tighter." -- Melissa Marr

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "love, I've come to understand is more than three words mumbled before bedtime." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are, and always have been, my dream." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I talk to you as I talk to my own soul," he said, turning me to face him. He reached up and cupped my cheek, fingers light on my temple. "And Sassenach," he whispered, "Your face is my heart." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "If aught must be lost, ‘twill be my honor for yours. If one must be forsaken, ‘twill be my soul for yours. Should death come anon, ‘twill be my life for yours. I am Given." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description:
"The kiss....was not meant to seduce, it was meant to mark a woman's soul.
Chloe" -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "It's not about you, okay? This time, it's about me. Not you. All my life, Lissa... all my life, it's been the same. <i>They come first</i>. I've lived my life for you. I've trained to be your shadow, but you know what? I want to come first. I need to take care of myself for once. I'm tired of looking out for everyone else and having to put aside what <i>I</i> want. Dimitri and I did that, and look what happened. He's gone. I will never hold him again. Now I owe it to him to do this. I'm sorry if it hurts you, but it's my choice!" -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Adrian!" Something inside of me burst. "Will you shut the hell up for five seconds?" -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Richelle Mead
Nahe add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Richelle Mead
Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I can bear pain myself, he said softly, but I couldna bear yours. That would take more strength than I have." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "D'ye think I don't know?" he asked softly. "It's me that has the easy part now. For if ye feel for me as I do for you-then I'm asking you to tear out your heart and live without it." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I prayed all the way up that hill yesterday, he said softly. Not for you to stay; I didna think that would be right. I prayed I'd be strong enough to send ye away. He shook his head, still gazing up the hill, a faraway look in his eyes. I said 'Lord, if I've never had courage in my life before, let me have it now. Let me be brave enough not to fall on my knees and beg her to stay.' He pulled his eyes away from the cottage and smiled briefly at me. Hardest thing I ever did, Sassenach." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "Blood of my Blood," he whispered, "and bone of my bone. You carry me within ye, Claire, and ye canna leave me now, no matter what happens, You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I wilna let ye go." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "And I mean to hear ye groan like that again. And to moan and sob, even though you dinna wish to, for ye canna help it. I mean to make you sigh as though your heart would break, and scream with the wanting, and at last to cry out in my arms, and I shall know that I've served ye well." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "Oh, aye, Sassenach. I am your master . . . and you're mine. Seems I canna possess your soul without losing my own." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "Lord, ye gave me a rare woman, and God! I loved her well." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I had one last try. "Does it bother you that I'm not a virgin?" He hesitated a moment before answering. "Well, no," he said slowly, "so long as it doesna bother you that I am." He grinned at my drop-jawed expression, and backed toward the door. "Reckon one of us should know what they're doing," he said. The door closed softly behind him; clearly the courtship was over." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "If it was a sin for you to choose me . . . then I would go to the Devil himself and bless him for tempting ye to it." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I wept bitterly, surrendering momentarily to my fear and heartbroken confusion, but slowly I began to quiet a bit, as Jamie stroked my neck and back, offering me the comfort of his broad, warm chest. My sobs lessened and I began to calm myself, leaning tiredly into the curve of his shoulder. No wonder he was so good with horses, I thought blearily, feeling his fingers rubbing gently behind my ears, listening to the soothing, incomprehensible speech. If I were a horse, I'd let him ride me anywhere." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Nahe add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
